metadata.dc:author: Alberdi, Rosamar√≠a
metadata.dc:description: As a critique to a television program, the author concludes: if the proposed values propounded in this television episode being commented on consist in ridiculing problems such as sexual dependence and violence committed against women, then effectively the program is proposing a society in which "Here no one will be able to survive".
metadata.dc:title: Sobre la necesaria defensa de la dignidad.
[On the necessary defense of dignity].
